alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tishomingo and southeastern Alcorn Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 930 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burnsville, or 10 miles west of Iuka, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Leedy, Farmington, Bacon Springs, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Doskie, Strickland and Blythe Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
